Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to providing secondary bonding authority to the Buffalo fiscal stability authority
Summary: Provides secondary bonding authority up to $150,000,000 to the Buffalo fiscal stability authority during the period of July 1, 2026 and June 30, 2030; extends the authority to 2047.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing secondary bonding authority to the Buffalo fiscal stability authority
